name: @stela/thumbnail_refresh
description: A tool to regenerate CDN URLs for Permanent.org thumbnails that will soon expire
author: Permanent.org

scripts.lint: npm run check-format && npm run check-types && npm run eslint
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tscp -p tsconfig.tscp.json
scripts.set-up-database: docker exec --env='PGPASSWORD=permanent' devenv-database-1 pg_dump -U postgres permanent --schema-only | psql postgresql://postgres:permanent@localhost:5432/test_permanent
scripts.test: npm run clear-database && npm run create-database && npm run set-up-database && node --experimental-vm-modules ../../node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js -i --silent=false
